titleStmt.title: The nature of the two testaments, or, The disposition of the will and estate of God to mankind for holiness and happiness by Jesus Christ ... in two volumes : the first volume, of the will of God : the second volume, of the estate of God / by Robert Dixon.
titleStmt.author: Dixon, Robert, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
